name: KnowledgeMill Link File
summary: File used by KnowledgeMill Filer, a Microsoft Outlook plug-in used for filing email content based on categories and business criticalness; saves a link to an artifact (e.g., a document) filed into a KnowledgeMill server.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Microsoft Outlook with KnowledgeMill Filer plug-in
